alert.note: Alert for Essex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:54PM EDT until June 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL MIDDLESEX...CENTRAL NORTHUMBERLAND...SOUTHEASTERN RICHMOND...SOUTHEASTERN ESSEX AND LANCASTER COUNTIES... At 754 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Morattico, or near Robley, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Lancaster around 810 PM EDT. Kilmarnock around 825 PM EDT. White Stone around 835 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Byrdton, Regina, Mollusk, Senora, Brook Vale, Nuttsville, Bertrand, Belle Isle State Park, Millenbeck and Tidewater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
